text: "Matchbox" is a 1957 song by Carl Perkins and was released along with its A-side Your True Love. It was produced and engineered by Sam Phillips and was covered by The Beatles in 1964 for the movie A Hard Day's Night and for the EP Long Tall Sally. It went to number 17 in the United States and Canada. ==References== Category:1957 songs Category:Rockabilly songs Category:The Beatles songs
title: Matchbox (song)
